revised_title: African Satellite Communication Systems and Their Implications in the 1990s
tldr: This article discusses the Afsat project, a regional African communication satellite system promoted and studied by Eurospace. It examines the current communication situation in Africa, the mission requirements for the Afsat system, and the feasibility of the system's space and ground segments. The study also assesses the economic viability of the Afsat system, comparing it to alternative space and terrestrial solutions.
